description:
The Akudarma Trio head to Kyoto in 1169 to find Minamoto no Yoshitsune. They find a giant named Musashibo Benkei waiting on a bridge. Suddenly, a beautiful and mysterious young man appears and fights Benkei, and somehow wins. This beautiful young man eventually becomes Yoshitsune. He later teams up with his older brother and they get revenge on the Heike. However, the brothers eventually end up quarreling. Yoshitsune wants to figure out a way to make up with his brother. Tokio and Calen eventually show up and apparently Tokio has a secret?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Major Player of the Genpei War! What`s the Super Surprising Reason Minamoto no Yoshitsune Was Able to Defeat Benkei?!
Genpei Kassen de Katsuyaku! Minamoto no Yoshitsune ga Benkei ni Uchikatta Bikkuri Dokkuri na Riyuu to wa!?
源平合戦で活躍! 源義経が弁慶に打ち勝ったビックリドッキリな理由とは!?
